ygData.subject: Re: Skull Fanged Stilleto
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you.  The Totem staff is my weapon of choice.   But, while near safer lands, I switch to a Giant snake fang, and hit easy creatures.  Just to keep
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you. The Totem staff is my weapon of choice. But, while near safer lands, I switch to a Giant snake fang, and hit easy creatures. Just to keep my piercing skill maxed.

Just a comment.

Drev

> ----------
> From: Larimus La'shain[SMTP:larimus@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 10:35 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Skull Fanged Stilleto
>
> From: "Larimus La'shain" <larimus@...>
>
> Problem with that stiletto is that by the time any wizard is high
> enough level to get it, they will have used the Runed Totem Staff for
> so long that their piercing would be too low for the stilletto to be
> any good. Just my theory. Any comments are welcome
>
>
